title: The One About Award Shows
itunes:author: Sibling Rivalry & Studio71
content:encoded:
It's awards season and no one is safe!! This week Bob and Monét talk all things awards from their dreams of EGOTing, to award shows they deem irrelevant, to the most shocking and iconic moments in award show history. And they of course address the elephant in the room: The Chris Rock Slap of 2022.

Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
